mapDetail.name: wolf-skull
mapDetail.title: Skull
mapDetail.description: Wolves have large teeth, and jaws with a bite force of 1,200 pounds per square inch, capable of crushing the thighbone of a moose.

mapDetail.name: wolf-pup
mapDetail.title: Eight Week Old Puppy
mapDetail.description: The young wolves watch the behaviors of the adults and see how the game is played. They learn how the hunters handle each different situation: what to do when the prey dashes for open ground, or turns to defend itself. In this way knowledge is passed from one generation to the next.
